name: ESC. (GDKO 2023 - Round 1)
description:
A 2D pixel art platformer that you can speedrun, avoid the weird particles on your way and beware, the Shadow is purchasing you... and there is only one way to escape.

You can double jump, wall jump, slide on walls... have fun and good luck :)

Please let me know what do you think about the game feel in the comments, this is my (kind of )first "game" and I wish I could do more, but I'm very happy with what I have accomplished.

Thank you for playing !

PS: music is samples from Four Tet, sorry if it gets annoying but rhythm  might help focus (or destroy it)

da-dam
